replies.msg:
計到係B贏 無check有冇bug 所以唔保證啱
[code]
<script>
var whoWin = {};
var winBy = {};

var initState = {
"A": [3,4,4,5,5,12,12,13,13,14,15], // Q -> 12, K -> 13, A -> 14, 2 -> 15
"B": [6,15,15],
"table": [], // empty -> pass, length == 1 -> single card, length == 2 -> pair
"turn": "A"
};

function stateToString(state){
return "[" + state.A.join(",") + "];[" + state.B.join(",") + "];[" + state.table.join(",") + "];" + state.turn;
}

function cloneState(state){
return {
"A": state.A.slice(0),
"B": state.B.slice(0),
"table": state.table.slice(0),
"turn": state.turn
};
}

function computeWhoWin(state){
var stateString = stateToString(state);

if (whoWin[stateString] != undefined) return whoWin[stateString];

if (state.A.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "A";
winBy[stateString] = "A trivial wins";
return "A";
}
if (state.B.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "B";
winBy[stateString] = "B trivial wins";
return "B";
}

if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 2){ // put pair to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length - 1; i++){
if (state[state.turn][i ] != state[state.turn][i + 1]) continue;
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ], trial[trial.turn][i + 1]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 2);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "," + trial.table[1] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 1){ // put single card to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length; i++){
if (state.table.length == 1){
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
if (state.table[0] == 15 && state.turn == 'B') continue;
}
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 1);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 1 || state.table.length == 2){ // pass
{
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [];
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "pass";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
whoWin[stateString] = (state.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
winBy[stateString] = "A always lose";
return whoWin[stateString];
}

document.write(computeWhoWin(initState) + '<br />');
document.write('<pre>');
for (var k in whoWin){
document.write(k + ':' + winBy[k] + '<br />');
}
document.write('</pre>');
</script>
[/code]

計到係B贏 無check有冇bug 所以唔保證啱
[code]
<script>
var whoWin = {};
var winBy = {};

var initState = {
"A": [3,4,4,5,5,12,12,13,13,14,15], // Q -> 12, K -> 13, A -> 14, 2 -> 15
"B": [6,15,15],
"table": [], // empty -> pass, length == 1 -> single card, length == 2 -> pair
"turn": "A"
};

function stateToString(state){
return "[" + state.A.join(",") + "];[" + state.B.join(",") + "];[" + state.table.join(",") + "];" + state.turn;
}

function cloneState(state){
return {
"A": state.A.slice(0),
"B": state.B.slice(0),
"table": state.table.slice(0),
"turn": state.turn
};
}

function computeWhoWin(state){
var stateString = stateToString(state);

if (whoWin[stateString] != undefined) return whoWin[stateString];

if (state.A.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "A";
winBy[stateString] = "A trivial wins";
return "A";
}
if (state.B.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "B";
winBy[stateString] = "B trivial wins";
return "B";
}

if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 2){ // put pair to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length - 1; i++){
if (state[state.turn][i ] != state[state.turn][i + 1]) continue;
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ], trial[trial.turn][i + 1]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 2);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "," + trial.table[1] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 1){ // put single card to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length; i++){
if (state.table.length == 1){
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
if (state.table[0] == 15 && state.turn == 'B') continue;
}
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 1);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 1 || state.table.length == 2){ // pass
{
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [];
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "pass";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
whoWin[stateString] = (state.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
winBy[stateString] = "A always lose";
return whoWin[stateString];
}

document.write(computeWhoWin(initState) + '<br />');
document.write('<pre>');
for (var k in whoWin){
document.write(k + ':' + winBy[k] + '<br />');
}
document.write('</pre>');
</script>
[/code]

2. 係有個先驗套路必須遵守 呢set套路叫規則 即係枱面係K你唔可以出6咁
3. 個result係gen個套路出黎 呢set套路叫B既必勝法 因為呢個正正就係呢個段code既目的
4. 唔係我個algorithm暗含左個必勝法 係個game dynamic暗含左個必勝法 我個algorithm(其實都唔係我個algorithm 人人都係咁做 大路野黎)係用黎搵個必勝法出黎
5. 有好多常見既game都存在必勝法 例如圍棋 象棋 之類 有必勝法唔係啲咩好奇怪既事

咁我明了 姐係你個algo係搵出應對A點出B點出必勝
但因為A喺某啲情況唔可以應對B嘅出法
所以個algo搵嘅方法可能會無結果或者只有某幾種結果

e.g. A: 葵3 葵5 B:大dee 葵4
個algo嘅results係
A:葵3 B:dee A:pass B:葵4 ->B win
A:葵5 B:dee A:pass B:葵4 >B win
所以'B有必勝法'

但如果假設B鍾意永遠出細牌先:
A: 葵3 B:葵4 A:葵5 ->A win 嘅話 A係可以贏嘅

計到係B贏 無check有冇bug 所以唔保證啱
[code]
<script>
var whoWin = {};
var winBy = {};

var initState = {
"A": [3,4,4,5,5,12,12,13,13,14,15], // Q -> 12, K -> 13, A -> 14, 2 -> 15
"B": [6,15,15],
"table": [], // empty -> pass, length == 1 -> single card, length == 2 -> pair
"turn": "A"
};

function stateToString(state){
return "[" + state.A.join(",") + "];[" + state.B.join(",") + "];[" + state.table.join(",") + "];" + state.turn;
}

function cloneState(state){
return {
"A": state.A.slice(0),
"B": state.B.slice(0),
"table": state.table.slice(0),
"turn": state.turn
};
}

function computeWhoWin(state){
var stateString = stateToString(state);

if (whoWin[stateString] != undefined) return whoWin[stateString];

if (state.A.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "A";
winBy[stateString] = "A trivial wins";
return "A";
}
if (state.B.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "B";
winBy[stateString] = "B trivial wins";
return "B";
}

if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 2){ // put pair to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length - 1; i++){
if (state[state.turn][i ] != state[state.turn][i + 1]) continue;
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ], trial[trial.turn][i + 1]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 2);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "," + trial.table[1] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 1){ // put single card to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length; i++){
if (state.table.length == 1){
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
if (state.table[0] == 15 && state.turn == 'B') continue;
}
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 1);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 1 || state.table.length == 2){ // pass
{
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [];
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "pass";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
whoWin[stateString] = (state.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
winBy[stateString] = "A always lose";
return whoWin[stateString];
}

document.write(computeWhoWin(initState) + '<br />');
document.write('<pre>');
for (var k in whoWin){
document.write(k + ':' + winBy[k] + '<br />');
}
document.write('</pre>');
</script>
[/code]

if (state.A.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "A";
winBy[stateString] = "A trivial wins";
return "A";
}
if (state.B.length == 0){
whoWin[stateString] = "B";
winBy[stateString] = "B trivial wins";
return "B";
}

if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 2){ // put pair to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length - 1; i++){
if (state[state.turn][i ] != state[state.turn][i + 1]) continue;
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ], trial[trial.turn][i + 1]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 2);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "," + trial.table[1] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 0 || state.table.length == 1){ // put single card to table
for (var i = 0; i < state[state.turn].length; i++){
if (state.table.length == 1){
if (state[state.turn][i ] < state.table[0]) continue;
if (state.table[0] == 15 && state.turn == 'B') continue;
}
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [trial[trial.turn][i ]];
trial[trial.turn].splice(i, 1);
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "[" + trial.table[0] + "]";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
if (state.table.length == 1 || state.table.length == 2){ // pass
{
var trial = cloneState(state);
trial.table = [];
trial.turn = (trial.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
if (computeWhoWin(trial) == state.turn){
whoWin[stateString] = state.turn;
winBy[stateString] = "pass";
return state.turn;
}
}
}
whoWin[stateString] = (state.turn == 'A' ? 'B' : 'A');
winBy[stateString] = "A always lose";
return whoWin[stateString];
}

document.write(computeWhoWin(initState) + '<br />');
document.write('<pre>');
for (var k in whoWin){
document.write(k + ':' + winBy[k] + '<br />');
}
document.write('</pre>');
</script>
